title: Hour 2 -  Dave Moody and Nick Wright (06-22-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 -  Dave Moody and Nick Wright (06-22-20)
description:
Dave Moody tells Dan its time for Nascar to weed out the racist in Nascar. Dave says he is confident that Nascar will find out who left that noose. Nick Wright says he gives Colin Kaepernick a 20% chance of playing in the NFL. Nick tells Dan the he and Kaepernick are friends and that he believes that Kaepernick would definitely accept a back up role if given a chance.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Nick tells Dan the he and Kaepernick are friends and that he believes that Kaepernick would definitely accept a back up role if given a chance.
